description: The Gonzo series consists of shirts with the "Camp Shirt" silhouette, our favorite because it allows you to breathe and relax whatever the situation. Call it a party shirt, we prefer to call it an everyday shirt. The Gonzo Viaje is the improbable encounter of a Hawaiian shirt with sporadic pieces of memories from our adventure in the heart of Mexico.
name: Roark Gonzo Viaje SS Woven - Mens
